title: What Do You Think That Happiness Is?

tokens.lyric: "What do you think that happiness is?"

lines.raw: [D]"What do you think that happiness is?"

tokens.lyric: So I brought my question to the stars.

lines.raw: [Bm]So I brought my question to the stars.

tokens.lyric: "Most important is for people to be friends,"

lines.raw: [G]"Most important is for people to be friends,"

tokens.lyric: Said the stars with one accord.

lines.raw: [A7]Said the stars with one accord.

tokens.lyric: "Shining sun is at the center of us all;

lines.raw: [A7]"Shining sun is at the center of us all;

tokens.lyric: Twinkling the nine of us go round the sun,

lines.raw: [D]Twinkling the nine of us go round the sun,

tokens.lyric: And the light of Love is given to us all; this we know is happiness"

lines.raw: [Bm]And the light of Love is given to us all; this we know is happiness"

tokens.lyric: "What do you think that happiness is?"

lines.raw: [D]"What do you think that happiness is?"

tokens.lyric: Now I asked the flowers to respond.

lines.raw: [Bm]Now I asked the flowers to respond.

tokens.lyric: "We compete in sharing beauty all around,"

lines.raw: [G]"We compete in sharing beauty all around,"

tokens.lyric: Was the answer of the rose.

lines.raw: [A7]Was the answer of the rose.

tokens.lyric: "Dressing with care in red and white and yellow robes,

lines.raw: [A7]"Dressing with care in red and white and yellow robes,

tokens.lyric: Every blossom is a joy to see;

lines.raw: [D]Every blossom is a joy to see;

tokens.lyric: So when people say how beautiful we are, this we know is happiness."

lines.raw: [Bm]So when people say how beautiful we are, this we know is happiness."

tokens.lyric: "What do you think that happiness is?"

lines.raw: [D]"What do you think that happiness is?"

tokens.lyric: Now I asked the busy meadowlarks.

lines.raw: [Bm]Now I asked the busy meadowlarks.

tokens.lyric: "We delight in flying high and very far,"

lines.raw: [G]"We delight in flying high and very far,"

tokens.lyric: Sang the larks in joyful song.

lines.raw: [A7]Sang the larks in joyful song.

tokens.lyric: "Though we're soaring ever higher than before,

lines.raw: [A7]"Though we're soaring ever higher than before,

tokens.lyric: Sky is above us even higher still;

lines.raw: [D]Sky is above us even higher still;

tokens.lyric: So forever we'll discover greater heights; this we know is happiness."

lines.raw: [Bm]So forever we'll discover greater heights; this we know is happiness."

tokens.lyric: "What do you think that happiness is?"

lines.raw: [D]"What do you think that happiness is?"

tokens.lyric: So I asked a flock of gentle sheep.

lines.raw: [Bm]So I asked a flock of gentle sheep.

tokens.lyric: "Joy is searching for and following the Lord,"

lines.raw: [G]"Joy is searching for and following the Lord,"

tokens.lyric: Said the sheep in soft reply.

lines.raw: [A7]Said the sheep in soft reply.

tokens.lyric: "Should the wolves be creeping over to attack,

lines.raw: [A7]"Should the wolves be creeping over to attack,

tokens.lyric: We only listen to the Shepherd's voice.

lines.raw: [D]We only listen to the Shepherd's voice.

tokens.lyric: Our Lord gives to us security and calm; this we know is happiness."

lines.raw: [Bm]Our Lord gives to us security and calm; this we know is happiness."

source:
{title: What Do You Think That Happiness Is?}
{key: D}

{section: Verse 1}
[D]"What do you think that happiness is?"
[Bm]So I brought my question to the stars.
[G]"Most important is for people to be friends,"
[A7]Said the stars with one accord.
[A7]"Shining sun is at the center of us all;
[D]Twinkling the nine of us go round the sun,
[Bm]And the light of Love is given to us all; this we know is happiness"

{{section: Verse 2}
[D]"What do you think that happiness is?"
[Bm]Now I asked the flowers to respond.
[G]"We compete in sharing beauty all around,"
[A7]Was the answer of the rose.
[A7]"Dressing with care in red and white and yellow robes,
[D]Every blossom is a joy to see;
[Bm]So when people say how beautiful we are, this we know is happiness."

{{section: Verse 3}
[D]"What do you think that happiness is?"
[Bm]Now I asked the busy meadowlarks.
[G]"We delight in flying high and very far,"
[A7]Sang the larks in joyful song.
[A7]"Though we're soaring ever higher than before,
[D]Sky is above us even higher still;
[Bm]So forever we'll discover greater heights; this we know is happiness."

{{section: Verse 4}
[D]"What do you think that happiness is?"
[Bm]So I asked a flock of gentle sheep.
[G]"Joy is searching for and following the Lord,"
[A7]Said the sheep in soft reply.
[A7]"Should the wolves be creeping over to attack,
[D]We only listen to the Shepherd's voice.
[Bm]Our Lord gives to us security and calm; this we know is happiness."
